dmca.title: [EV1-C2070462B] Re: Copyright infringement
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Hope International [mailto:johnb.brown2@gmail.com] 
Sent: Friday, December 08, 2006 4:52 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: Re: FW: [EV1-C2070462B] Re: Copyright infringement



Please see attached signed letter and accompanying documents about
copyright infringement---John

Dear Andrea Almedia, Associate General Counsel ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc
	I am contacting you to inform that a site registered with you (www.godfuckingdamnit.com), has taken pictures that I own (http://good-times.webshots.com/album/74620684pqdZEO) and altered them on www.godfuckingdamnit.com (http://www.godfuckingdamnit. com/story.html?story_id=1410). My pictures have been altered without my permission as altered it without my permission. Please see original work (Original.doc) and infringed changes (Exhibits 1-5) accompanying this letter.  I sent a request to the web site
